title.@value: Systemic allergic reaction due to Hymenoptera venom

definition.@value: Systemic Allergic Reaction due to Hymenoptera venom due to insect venom is a severe hypersensitivity reaction with rapid onset of cutaneous, vascular or respiratory symptoms and signs, either singly or in any combination after exposure (mainly by sting) to an insect venom in a sensitized patient.

label.@value: Systemic allergic reaction due to Hymenoptera venom
